reviews.review: The portal looks like my butthole
Literally the best puzzle game ever made, but you probably know that already.
It's just an amazing game,no complaints.
This game is an utter master piece and everyone knows it. If you haven't played this game do it, you won't regret it even once :)

I love the humor in this game.
genuinely so pretty and well made like i cannot believe it bro

You know you've found a good puzzle when you spend a lot of time on it before realizing that the answer is really simple and has been in front of you the whole time.

It's definitely worth it for $10.
its a great game and people should try it
is portal 2, youse dont need a review
this game is my definition of a perfect game.

Hella fun and amazing quality for a game made in 2011
This game has been my favourite for a long time, the mechanics, story and visuals are just incredible for something back from 2011. highly reccomend
